**Task**
Create a thumbnail graphic for the "" tutorial series to be used on this page https://thenewboston.com/tutorials/All

Thumbnail should:
- Incorporate the topic logo (if available)
- Match colors/styling for the topic
- Be high quality

**Image Specs**
Size: 1280 x 720
Format: JPG or PNG
